description: This February, we re bringing together the sharpest minds building at the intersection of AI, hardware, and crypto. From LLM agents to edge robotics, from early-stage founders to veteran crypto investors it all comes together in Hong Kong. This is not just another tech mixer. No fluff. No panels. Just real builders, real products, and real conversations. What Awaits You Key Insights from Pioneers Hear straight from leading startups and projects where AI meets hardware, robotics, and crypto real use cases from real builders. Deep-Dive Keynotes Focused presentations on the convergence of intelligent hardware, decentralized systems, and the evolving regulatory landscape. Meaningful Connections Substantive networking with founders, investors, and operators who are actively shaping these synergies. Meet the people behind the code and the chips Why Join Connect with pioneers at the nexus of crypto and intelligent hardware. Gain clarity on practical convergence and investment frontiers. Build relationships within a focused, high-caliber ecosystem of builders and funders.
